title: (x) "It's Nice That" logo typeface - FF DIN Condensed {Akira}
author: gro

comments.content: [FF DIN Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20131223055508/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/fontfont/ff_din_ot_condensed_bold/?&acs=1&acs_ss=0&sample_text=It%E2%80%99s%20Nice%20That&sample_size=48&acs_pt=36&update=0). The i is an alternate character.
